title: NME 2015 icon: I'd like it back
body:
If there's anything I miss from my account (other than my 600$ spent on it) is the NME icon I got. I really miss it. Seeing some people with it makes me really upset. It was rare, and I really loved the team. I never took the icon off. After my perma ban I asked riot support if of all things, could I get my icon back. But no, they pick you out of the account completely. Crushed honestly, none of the new icons really peak my interest.
I would really like it back Riot. Please, I beg of you...

replies.body: When an account is banned, it wouldn't mean too much if the person was able to move content off of the banned account onto a new one. It'd be as if they were never punished at all. This is the main reason why we can't move content off of a punished account.
